content: Menu Matchmaker
Menu Matchmaker is a personalized restaurant recommendation service that helps users find the perfect restaurant based on their budget, cuisine and ambience preferences.
Personalized recommendations, budget filter, cuisine filter, ambience filter, online booking
OpenTable, Yelp, Zomato, TripAdvisor, TheFork
Personalized recommendations based on budget and preferences
Early Bird Specials
Early Bird Specials is a website and mobile app that curates a list of restaurants that offer discounted prices during specific hours of the day.
Discount filter, time filter, online booking, user reviews, location-based search
Groupon, LivingSocial, Grubhub, Uber Eats, DoorDash
Focuses on restaurants that offer discounted prices rather than the quality of food
Date in a Box
Date in a Box is a subscription service that delivers a curated dining experience to your doorstep. Each box is a surprise and includes a meal kit for two, a themed ambiance and music playlist.
Meal kit for two, themed ambiance, music playlist, monthly delivery, online support
HelloFresh, Blue Apron, Plated, Sun Basket, Home Chef
Delivers a unique dining experience at home rather than going out to a restaurant
Secret Menu Finder

Secret Menu Finder is a mobile app that helps users discover hidden or off-menu items at popular restaurants. This allows users to eat at their favorite restaurants on a budget as these menu items are often cheaper than regular menu items.
Secret menu filter, location-based search, user reviews, discount coupons, loyalty programs
Yelp, Zomato, TripAdvisor, Google Maps, Eater
Focuses on discovering menu items that are not commonly known to the general public
pain_point_description: the individual wants to impress their date with a nice restaurant, but they have a limited budget. they are looking for affordable options that still offer a great dining experience
audience_title: pick a good restaurant for a date
